text: The Apostolic Nunciature to North Macedonia is an ecclesiastical office of the Catholic Church in North Macedonia. It is a diplomatic post of the Holy See, whose representative is called the Apostolic Nuncio with the rank of an ambassador. ==Representatives of the Holy See to North Macedonia == *Edmond Farhat (26 July 1995 - 11 December 2001) *Marian Oleś (11 December 2001 \- 1 May 2002) *Giuseppe Leanza (18 May 2002 \- 22 February 2003) *Santos Abril y Castelló (12 April 2003 \- 9 January 2011) *Janusz Bolonek (4 May 2011 \- 6 December 2013) *Anselmo Guido Pecorari (11 July 2014 – present) ==See also== *Foreign relations of the Holy See *List of diplomatic missions of the Holy See ==References== North Macedonia Category:Holy See–North Macedonia relations
title: Apostolic Nunciature to North Macedonia
